UNIVERSITY OF ILLINOIS AT THE MEDICAL CENTER PUBLIC INFORMATION
18 S3 WEST POLK STREET/ CHICAGO, ILLINOIS 6 0 612
July 10, 1964
Mr. Marion Corwell, Chairman
Associate Director
Office of School Relations
Dearborn Public Schools
Dearborn, Michigan
Dear Mr. Corwell:
In corresponding with the members and associates of the
NAEB, they referred me to you. I am associated with the
University of Illinois Medical Center Campus in Chicago.
We, at the University of Illinois, produced various radio
and television programs that we would like to have submitted,
if this is possible, to the award committee of the NAEB.
We feel that these programs are well done and deserve some
recognition. I was wondering if such awards are given for
public service radio and television programming, and if so,
what would be the procedure in regard to submitting such
material.
My main function is in the area of public relations and radioÂ¬
television programming. I would like to offer my services
to you and your committee.
I feel strongly about my association with the NAEB and that
it is an excellent and worthwhile organization. I would
like very much to continue directly, the good work that NAEB
has provided over these many years.
Any help that I might be able to contribute, please feel free
to contact me.
Sincerely
Assistant Manager
Producer-Director
,JWR:ac
